attributes.action: ALLOW TENANTS IN RURAL HOUSES TO PURCHASE THEIR HOME
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment tenants who live in rural areas are excluded from the Right to  Aquire and  Social Homebuy Schemes, simply because of the property's location, this is unfair and should be amended as soon as possible to give ALL tenants the right to purchase their rented home under one or other of the schemes.
